helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox
helmet.description: Collect data and provide useful tools for TenkafuMA! to pick up Caesar's slack.

content.name: introduction
content: The goal of this website is to collect, organize and present the data in Tenkafu MA!.
This website currently includes recruitment filter, item drops filter and character potential material calculator.

content.name: disclaimer
content: All materials and information on this website are collected from players and may not reflect the actual situation. The actual gameplay shall prevail.

content.name: feedback
content: Suggestion and thoughts are welcome. Please check
here

content.name: reference

helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox — Characters potential
helmet.description: Calculate the requirement of potential material and buff of characters in TenkafuMA!.

content.title: Introduction
content: This page is to calculate the requirement of potential material and buff of characters.

content.title: How To
content: Select character and current and target stages (both included) to calculate the material requirement.
E.g. If current stage is 1-1 and target is 6-1, the result stands for the summation of all required material from stage 1 to 5 and the first grid of stage 6.

content.title: Notes
content: There are four types of potential patterns which are attacker type, defender type, supporter type and N/R type, a type shared by N/R characters. Note that the attacker, defender and supporter here are not identical to character positions. (e.g. Juneau is an attacker in character position but a support in potential type.)
Most results are inferred from patterns of character potential, not from actual data.

helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox — Characters stats.
helmet.description: Calculate the stats of characters in TenkafuMA!.

content.title: Introduction
content: Calculate the attack and hp values of characters.

content.title: How To
content: Select character states to calculate the attack and hp values.

content.title: Notes
content: There are five things affect the character attack and hp, which are their initial values, level, potential stage, discipline stage and star. And the formula of character attack and hp is
(Initial value) × 1.1^(Level - 1) × (1 + Potential buff) × (1 + Discipline buff) × (Star buff).
where　Potential buff = depends on character potential type and stage, you can find it at potential calculator
Discipline buff = 5% × stage
Star buff = (Star + 5) / (Original star + 5)
*Bond only affect the skill effect.

helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox — Recruitment
helmet.description: Present character tags for recruitment in TenkafuMA!.

helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox — Recruitment filter
helmet.description: Apply tags in TenkafuMA! recruitment to screen out characters.

content.title: Introduction
content: Apply the tags you get to find possible characters.

content.title: How To
content: Select tags to filter out characters.
Sort result by clicking the table header.
Star icon after characters means there are some combinations lead to only one character. Hover on (long press on moblie) the character to show the combinations.

content.title: Common scenario
content: Target at SR (or higher) characters:
Select five tags you get from the recruitment.
If there is a star icon after SR characters, then it's worth a shot.

content.title: Notes
content: Only the leader tag can give you SSR.
Leader and elite tag don't guarantee SSR and SR respectively unless recruitment time is set to be 9 hours.
The probability of leader and elite tag is roughly 0.4% and 1.2% respectively.

content.title: Limitations
content: Deletion of tags is not considered.
Even if there is a star icon, it does not guarantee you can get the character becasue of tag deletion and incompleteness of collected data.

helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox — Item drops
helmet.description: Show item drops of main stages.

content.title: Introduction
content: This page is to find the stages that includes all target items.

content.title: How To
content: Select items to filter out stages.
Sort result by clicking the table header.

content.title: Notes
content: Only includes items that drops in 'World' instance.
The same rarity does not refer to the same drop rate. It depends on the tier of items and the stages.

helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox — Line-up analysis
helmet.description: Provide visual representations to help you understand your line-up.

content.title: Introduction
content: Provide visual representations to help you understand your line-up.

content.title: How to
content: Select the character states according to your line-up and toggle the character ownership by tapping the image of the character.
After you finish, the analysis will show at the 'result' page.
You can save, load and delete the data by clicking the buttons.

helmet.title: TenkafuMA! toolbox — Line-up analysis
helmet.description: Provide visual representations to help you understand your line-up.

content.title: Definition
content: Character combat power is the product of the character ATK and HP.

content.title: Note
content: Character skills and bond is not considered and thus it may not provide enough insights into the characters.

rankModal.content: PR is the percentile rank and is calculated by the data collected in this website.

404.title: Not found
404.p: Sorry, Aiko couldn't find what you are looking for.
